data.title: Imperium Group
data.text:
Rhona Humphreys

Group Operations Director

Email: rhona.humphreys@imperiumfs.com

Telephone: +44 1481 728380

Rhona joined the company in 2012 in the combined role of Client Services Director and Chief Operating Officer, she subsequently moved to Operations Director and Compliance Director of the Guernsey Trust Company and currently holds the role of Group Operations Director. Rhona brings with her 30 years’ experience in the Guernsey fiduciary sector

Previously Rhona was Director of locally-based Ardel Trust Company, where she was responsible for the organisation’s trust and company management and administration team. This included work relating to property investment, employee benefit trusts, trading relationships, pension products, limited partnerships and New Zealand trusts, to name a few.

Rhona also has experience running managed trust services for third parties who want the benefits of being in Guernsey whilst not wishing to establish their own trust companies. Additionally, she played a large part in developing policies and procedures, enabling efficient and effective client service, whilst maintaining an appropriate level of control over a client’s affairs.

Rhona is a member of STEP, a Fellow of the Institute of Directors, and currently the Chairman of the Guernsey Association of Trustees. In her spare time, Rhona enjoys playing badminton, reading, keeping fit and spending time with her family.

Roy McGregor

Group Chairman

Email: roy.mcgregor@imperiumfs.com

Telephone: +44 1481 728380

Roy took on the role of Chairman for Imperium Guernsey in July 2017 and for Imperium UK since it was established in June 2019. Having stepped down from his previous position as CEO of Credit Suisse in the Channel Islands in December 2016, a role he had held for ten years. Roy has over 36 years’ experience within the financial services industry having worked in banks, insurance, investment and fiduciary companies in a number of diverse roles including both advising them as clients and working within them as a senior executive or board member.

Roy has worked in both Europe and Asia with firms as varied as a mainland Chinese bank to world-wide financial institutions and has been a member of board, audit or risk committees within four major financial institutions in Asia, London, the Caribbean and the Channel Islands. Whilst with Credit Suisse, Roy sat on 22 boards/branch management committees for the group in both executive and internal non-executive roles.

Roy will be supporting Imperium with its on-going development strategy as the company continues to grow its client base service delivery and market base in Guernsey and the United Kingdom.

Outside of the office, his interests include walking, water sports, swimming, golf, cooking and European and East Asian history.

David Gilmour

Group Managing Director

Email: david.gilmour@imperiumfs.com

Telephone: +44 1481 728380

David founded Imperium in October 2011. He is the company’s Financial Director and also oversees the Business Development & Strategy for the Guernsey and United Kingdom offices. David is a Chartered Accountant and Chartered Director and has significant experience in complex tax structuring, pension planning and sourcing and structuring property and bank financing.

David has nearly 15 years in the private client industry after successful roles at NM Rothschild and another Guernsey independent Trust Company. In these roles, David oversaw Private Client and Family Office investments, accounting and day-to-day administration and was able to build up an extensive network of contacts from the legal, advisory, and banking sectors.

Imperium has an international client focus, and David travels extensively within his role. As a result, David has developed an excellent contact and client base in the UK, Middle East, India, Eastern Europe and East and South Africa.

David enjoys travelling and experiencing new cultures and has experienced several extended trips overseas. He enjoys reading history and studying financial markets. David is a keen sportsman and regularly participates in rowing, squash, football and snooker. He is also a strong supporter of Scotland at football and rugby union.

Simon Young

Managing Director

Email: simon.young@imperiumfs.com

Telephone: +44 1534 837600

Simon joined Imperium in 2021 when the Group acquired an existing Jersey trust and company services business to establish its presence in the Island. Simon is a Chartered Accountant having qualified with the London Tax Division of Arthur Andersen. He has specialised in the delivery of governance and substance to significant private client structures for over 30 years and has worked with many leading tax advisers on the implementation and operation of those structures including family Private Trust Companies and GP/LP investment vehicles. Prior to joining Imperium Simon was Managing Director of a listed Fiduciary Services business in Jersey.

Simon has travelled extensively in his former roles, both establishing new offices in Europe and the Middle East and working with international clients and their advisers.

Simon remains a keen sportsman although not as competitive as he once was, and now enjoys rowing and skiing for the pleasure of the surroundings. He is also a regular attendee at Twickenham supporting the England rugby team.

Andrew Le Poidevin

Client Services Director

Email: andrew.lp@imperiumfs.com

Telephone: +44 1481 728380

Andrew is a law graduate from Exeter University and began his career in the Guernsey fiduciary sector in 2006. In 2008 Andrew became a Chartered Secretary with The Institute of Chartered Secretaries and Administrators and is a member of ICSA.

He joined Imperium in 2014 as a Trust Manager taking responsibility for the overall management and administration of a variety of trust and company structures. Andrew completed the Institute of Directors Diploma in Company Direction in July 2019 and was promoted to the Board of Imperium in July 2019 as a Client Services Director.

Outside of work, Andrew’s interests include weight training, running, travel, and he is also a keen follower of Manchester United Football Club.

Barry McClay

Managing Director - Funds

Email: barry.mcclay@imperiumfs.com

Telephone: +44 1481 728380

Barry helped establish Imperium Fund Services Limited in 2020 and is the company’s Managing Director. Barry is a Chartered Accountant and Chartered Director and holds an MBA. He has over 25 years of financial services experience.

Previously, Barry spent 15 years at Ipes – a leading provider of European private equity services – which included 12 years as shareholder and COO. He co-led Ipes through two private equity backed management buyouts and its trade sale to Apex in January 2019.

He is also an experienced director on private equity structures and has acted for many of the leading players in buyout, fund-of-funds and venture capital across Europe and Asia.

Barry is a long-standing member of the Education sub-committee of the Guernsey Investment & Funds Association.

Grant Twine

Managing Director

Email: grant.twine@imperiumfs.com

Telephone: +44 20 3026 5667

Grant joined Imperium in January 2019, initially as the head of new business and now managing director of Imperium’s UK offering. He was key in setting up the London office and incorporating Imperium UK in June 2019 which has since grown to nearly 30 staff across 4 UK offices. He is now both client and operationally focused and continues to be involved in business development.

Grant is a qualified Chartered Secretary and associate member of the Corporate Governance Institute as well as a long standing member of the Institute of Directors.

He started his career in Jersey in 1998 in the private client team of a leading law firm before moving to an independent Jersey trust corporation where he first became a director in 2005. He was then responsible for setting up the firm’s e-commerce team working with private and corporate clients. Later he spent two years in their Geneva office, helping expand the client offering to new markets before moving to London in 2013 to promote the firm’s services further. Grant then moved on to a large private Trust Group in their London office providing multi-jurisdictional offshore and onshore structures to international clients. In particular, he held responsibility for promoting the Middle East offices.

Grant is a keen sportsman, having competed in many running and triathlon events that he one day hopes to return back to. He enjoys mountain biking, sea kayaking, paddle-boarding and has a particular passion for skiing and travel.

Paul Le Tocq

Group Head of Risk

Email: paul.letocq@imperiumfs.com

Telephone: +44 1481 728380

Paul joined Imperium Fund Services Limited in June 2023 as Group Head of Risk & Compliance and brings with him over 10-years’ financial services experience in Compliance and Financial Crime in Guernsey.

Paul Initially worked in Law Enforcement at the Guernsey Border Agency before transitioning into financial investigations at the Guernsey Financial Intelligence Service and Guernsey Financial Investigation Unit. Immediately prior to joining Imperium, Paul headed up the Financial Crime Compliance teams at Butterfield Bank & Trust Companies in Guernsey, where he also spent time in the Cayman office and as acting Group Head of Financial Crime. Paul has also previously held roles at the Royal Bank of Canada and Standard Charted in Guernsey.

Paul holds a Diploma in Financial Crime Compliance, gained with distinction from the International Compliance Association.

In his spare time, Paul is a keen sportsperson where his most notable achievements have come on the badminton court.

Adèle Perrot

Client Services Director

Email: adele.perrot@imperiumfs.com

Telephone: +44 1481 728380

Adèle joined Imperium Trust Company Limited in October 2023 as a Client Services Director. Adèle is a graduate of the Governance Institute and a member of the Society of Trust and Estate Practitioners (S.T.E.P.), with more than 22 years of financial services experience in Guernsey.

The majority of Adèle’s experience has been gained through working with Ultra High Net Worth clients in the private wealth space and she has extensive knowledge of Private Trust Company and Managed Trust Company structures, along with Family Office structures. She also spent 5 years working for a Trust Company in the British Virgin Islands, gaining an understanding of their jurisdictional requirements.

She is a committee member on the Guernsey Association of Trustees and was previously Chair of the S.T.E.P Committee for 3 years and a member for 10 years.

In her spare time, Adèle enjoys triathlons and recently completed an Ironman.

Andy Hatton

Director

Email: andy.hatton@imperiumfs.com

Telephone: +44 1481 728380

Andy joined Imperium Fund Services Limited in January 2021 and is a Director. Andy is a Chartered Manager (CMgr MCMI), holds the Diploma in Company Direction (Dip IoD), a Diploma in International Finance and Administration and is a Fellow of the Institute of Administrative Management, as well as having over 24 years of financial services experience in Guernsey.

Andy spent the previous 7 years at Belasko Administration and was Head of the Guernsey Funds team. He has gained further knowledge through his roles at Gentoo Fund Services, Ipes (Guernsey) Limited and Northern Trust International Fund Administration Services Limited.

Andy has extensive experience with both launching and administering regulated collective investment schemes, private investment funds and listed entities with a variety of real estate and private equity asset classes. Andy also acted as a director on General Partner boards through his fund service provider roles.

Andy spent a number of years as a member of the Administration sub-committee of the Guernsey Investment & Funds Association.

Ben Lister

Director

Email: benedict.lister@imperiumfs.com

Telephone: +44 20 3026 5667

Ben joined Imperium’s UK offering in January 2022 further to his family’s move back to the UK from Guernsey, working alongside Grant Twine.

Ben is a Chartered Accountant having qualified with PwC in Bristol and is also a charted fellow of the Chartered Institute for Securities & Investment (CISI) and was most recently employed by Intertrust in their Guernsey office. At Intertrust Ben headed up one of the Private Wealth client teams dealing with all types of trust and corporate structures.

Ben has worked in Guernsey, London, Luxembourg and Monaco.

Away from the office, Ben is a longstanding (and suffering) supporter of West Ham United and enjoys playing football both with his two boys and anyone else who will play against him!

Charlotte Parr

Director

Email: charlotte.parr@imperiumfs.com

Telephone: +44 1481 728380

Charlotte joined Imperium Fund Services Limited in 2020 and is a Director.

Charlotte holds a Diploma in International Finance and Administration, and has spent over ten years focusing on the establishment and regulation of private equity structures.

In 2012 she joined Ipes as part of their Guernsey on-boarding team, assisting clients in all steps necessary to complete their fund formation process (including administration, FATCA, CRS, Depositary, Annex IV Reporting and ESG Reporting).

Charlotte has worked in the fund administration sector in Luxembourg and London, gaining an understanding of their jurisdictional requirements, managing teams, and servicing clients in both jurisdictions. Charlotte has extensive knowledge in establishing structures in Guernsey, Jersey, Luxembourg, UK, and US.

She is a member of the Marketing sub-committee of the Guernsey Investment & Funds Association.

Colette Taylor

Director

Email: colette.taylor@imperiumfs.com

Telephone: +44 1481 728380

Colette joined Imperium Fund Services Limited in August 2021 as Head of Accounting.

Colette joined Imperium Fund Services Limited in August 2021 and is a Director.

Colette is a member of the Association of Chartered Certified Accountants and has spent the previous twelve years working in the private equity sector.

In 2009 she joined Ipes as part of their Guernsey New Business team, and subsequently undertook a variety of roles within the company including those in accounting, administration and management.

Colette has extensive experience with both the administration and financial reporting of private equity fund structures, including regulated collective investment schemes.

She is a member of the Administrator and Compliance sub-committee of the Guernsey Investment & Funds Association.

Euan Melrose

Director, Business Development

Email: euan.melrose@imperiumfs.com

Telephone: +44 1481 728380

Euan joined Imperium in 2019, having previously worked for Imperium for three years during 2014 – 2017. Euan spent his time away from the Company living and working in Bermuda for an international bank-owned trust company.

Prior to Euan originally joining Imperium in 2014 he worked for a large independent trust Company in Guernsey. Euan is responsible for assisting with the development of new and existing business for Imperium both in Guernsey and the United Kingdom and provides support to the team in Jersey. Euan is a member of the Society of Trust and Estate Practitioners and completed the Institute of Chartered Secretaries and Administrators Diploma qualification. Most recently Euan has obtained the IoD’s Certificate in Company Direction is working towards completing the IoD Diploma qualification.

Away from work Euan is a keen sportsman with a focus on Football and Squash as well as enjoying spending time with his family.

Jon Stewart

Director

Email: jon.stewart@imperiumfs.com

Telephone: +44 20 3026 5667

After completing a degree in Taxation and Law at Bournemouth University, Jon’s first job in tax was with OJ Kilkenny, a firm specialising in the tax affairs of sports people and entertainers. In 2006, Jon joined Rawlinson & Hunter, an international firm of Chartered Accountants, as a Private Client Tax Consultant and qualified as a Chartered Tax Adviser in 2007. He was promoted to Tax Manager, and then Senior Manager during his 12 years at the firm. Jon looked after a large list of individual clients, most of which were not domiciled in the UK.

Jon’s detailed areas of knowledge include domicile and residence issues, dealing with the completion of complex tax returns, and ensuring individuals’ UK tax affairs are managed efficiently. He particularly enjoys providing advice in relation to image right structure for sports and entertainers, and has successfully dealt with various HMRC enquiries into such structures over the years.

If you don’t find Jon in the office, he is most likely to be found on the golf course or chasing after one of his two young sons. A lifelong Arsenal fan, Jon enjoys staying fit and healthy and has completed numerous long-distance races including the London Marathon in 2016 and the London Triathlon in 2009.

Expertise

Tax Returns, Residency & domicile, HMRC enquiries.

Rob Ayliffe

Director

Email: robert.ayliffe@Imperiumfs.com

Telephone: +44 1534 837600

Rob joined the board of Imperium Trust Company (Jersey) Limited in April 2023 with responsibility for the oversight of client services and business development activities.

Rob is a qualified chartered accountant with over 30 years of financial services experience. He has held senior roles with PwC, Capita Asset Services and private client-focussed trust company businesses in Jersey, Kuala Lumpur, Singapore and London including two tours, covering a period of 6 years, based in SE Asia.

Rob has extensive experience servicing clients across all key sectors of the fiduciary services industry including corporate, funds and trusts for private, corporate and institutional clients. He has particular recent expertise helping entrepreneurs, HNWIs and wealthy family groups in the establishment of their family office or PTC structures and with the management of their luxury assets, in particular super yachts.

In his spare time, Rob enjoys windsurfing, surfing and running whilst being “The Bank of Dad” for his two daughters at university.

Chris Ash

Client Services Director

Email: christopher.ash@imperiumfs.com

Telephone: +44 1534 837600

Chris joined Imperium Trust Company (Jersey) Limited in October 2023 as a client director.

Chris has over 30 years’ experience in the private client industry an has a great blend of working for both the larger/major private banks as well as the smaller boutique trust companies. Chris has extensive experience in family office related matters, dealing with commercial and residential property in all entities to include JPUT’s and luxury and racing yacht management for clients. In addition to this, he helped set up and managed a number of COBO only Funds at a previous employee.

Chris holds the STEP qualification and is a member of the Society of Estates and Practitioners as well as holding the International Advanced Certificate in Compliance and Financial Crime.

In his spare time, Chris is a huge music fan trying to get to as many gigs as the budget allows and a keen (aspiring) guitarist. He also enjoys following most sports, football in particular and is a life -long Tottenham Hotspur supporter which is never a dull experience.

Luke Cornish

Client Services Director

Email: luke.cornish@imperiumfs.com

Telephone: +44 1534 837600

Luke joined Imperium Trust Company (Jersey) Limited in September 2023 as a Client Director.

Luke has held senior positions with local trust company businesses for over 5 years and has extensive experience of private client structures holding a varying array of assets.

Luke has extensive experience in the financial services industry in Jersey having started his career 18 years ago in the banking and investment sectors.

Luke holds a STEP Diploma and is a Member of the Society of Trust and Estate Practitioners.

In his spare time Luke enjoys spending time with his family and walking with his dog.

Nick Walker

Client Services Director

Email: nick.walker@imperiumfs.com

Telephone: +44 1534 837600

Nick joined Imperium Trust Company (Jersey) Limited in January 2023.

Having worked in the financial services sector for more than 20 years, Nick has extensive experience in managing multijurisdictional client portfolios containing a variety of assets including property, aircraft and artwork. Since 2004, Nick’s main focus and interest has been with maritime structures covering superyachts, ships and the offshore energy industry.

Prior to this Nick spent a number of years on the water working as a professional sailor.

Passionate about sailing, skiing and rugby, in his spare time Nick is likely to be found with his family on the water, up a mountain or at the local rugby club.

Becci Welsh

Associate Director

Email: becci.welsh@imperiumfs.com

Telephone: +44 1481 728380

Becci joined Imperium Group in March 2023 as an Associate Director.

After qualifying as an accountant with one of the big four audit firms, Becci joined the trust industry and has accumulated over 18 years of financial services experience in Guernsey undertaking a variety of roles including those in administration, operations and internal and client accounting.

Becci is a fellow of the Association of Chartered Certified Accountants and a member of The Society of Trust and Estate Practitioners. Most recently Becci has obtained the Institute of Director’s Certificate in Company Direction and is working towards completing the IoD Diploma qualification.

Patrick Collins

Senior Tax Manager

Email: patrick.collins@imperiumfs.com

Telephone: 01737 887690

Patrick is a private client specialist having worked in Private client tax since 2003. He qualified as an Associate of Taxation Technicians in 2006 and has worked within the Big 4, larger and boutique practices across London, Hampshire, and Surrey. Patrick is an experienced Tax professional with a demonstrated history of working with high-net-worth individuals, property owners, sole traders, owner managed businesses and non-UK domiciled clients.

The UK tax system is extremely complicated, and it is important to Patrick that his clients feel confident coming to him with any query, knowing that he will do his best to give them advice that is both technically correct, and works for them.

When Patrick is not in the office, he still likes to play football and enjoys the occasional Saturday morning Parkrun. As a father of three children, most of any other free time is taken up by taking them to their various clubs and supporting them in their endeavours.

Jo Morgan

Senior Trust Manager

Email: jo.morgan@imperiumfs.com

Telephone: +44 1481 728380

Jo started a career in the finance industry in 2007, working for a small trust office for 11 years before joining Imperium in 2018. Working in a small office gave Jo the opportunity to learn a wide range of skills.

Fully STEP qualified, Jo enjoys working on a variety of structures and likes to get involved in more complex matters whenever the opportunity arises. She especially enjoys being able to liaise directly with clients building long term professional relationships.

Outside of work Jo keeps busy with her family and her pets, as well as taking part in weekly Tap dancing classes.

Nikki Colley

Senior Trust Manager

Email: Nikki.Colley@imperiumfs.com

Telephone: +44 1481 728380

Nikki began her career in the Guernsey fiduciary sector in 1996 and has over 20 years of industry experience. In 2010 Nikki completed the Chartered Governance Institute’s Diploma in Offshore Finance and Administration with The Institute of Chartered Secretaries and Administrators and is a member of ICSA.

She joined Imperium in 2021 as a Senior Trust Manager taking responsibility for the overall management of a small team of trust professionals and the administration of a variety of trust and company structures. Nikki completed the Institute of Directors Certificate in Company Direction in July 2021 and the Diploma in December 2021.

Outside work, Nikki’s interests include basketball and sea swimming and she enjoys reading and spending time with her family and friends.

Rebecca Maitland

Senior Manager

Email: rebecca.maitland@imperiumfs.com

Telephone: +44 20 3026 5667

Rebecca qualified as a Chartered Accountant in 2006 and has specialised in private client tax since 2005. She qualified as a Chartered Tax Adviser in 2014 and has worked with a variety of small and larger firms in Surrey, more recently Smith and Williamson and Menzies. She has extensive experience dealing with high net worth individuals, property owners, sole traders, owner managed businesses, family groups and non UK domiciled clients.

Rebecca’s specialist knowledge areas include tax compliance, preparing complex tax returns, and providing tax planning advice to individuals and families to optimise their tax positions. This has involved advice regarding inheritance tax planning, selling assets, trusts, residency issues, and profit extraction from businesses.

When she is not in the office, Rebecca runs regularly with friends at a local club, taking part in 10Ks and raising money for charities. She also loves long distance hiking and swimming, particularly in the sea whenever the weather allows. Asides from sport, she enjoys socialising with friends and family, DIY, travelling and reading.

Expertise

Wealth Management, Tax Returns, Trusts & executorships

Tom Hamon

Senior Trust Manager

Email: tom.hamon@imperiumfs.com

Telephone: +44 1481 728380

Tom joined Imperium Trust Company Limited in April 2019 as a Trust Manager, being promoted to Senior Trust Manager in April 2022.

Tom is a Member of The Society of Trust and Estate Practitioners and is a Certified Accounting Technician with over 16 years of financial services experience in Guernsey.

Tom spent 7 years at local a Guernsey independent Trust Company dealing with a variety of asset holding structures, with particular experience and interest in UK commercial and residential property structuring, managing portfolios for clients based around the globe. He oversees a small team of trust professionals and the administration of a variety of trust and company structures, along with select pension products.

In his spare time, Tom likes travelling and socialising with friends and spending time with his young family.

Vicky Wilkinson

Head of Risk & Compliance

Email: victoria.wilkinson@imperiumfs.com

Telephone: +44 1534 837600

Vicky joined Imperium Trust Company (Jersey) Limited in 2021.

Vicky has held compliance positions, including those of key persons, with trust and funds businesses and has been working in Jersey finance for over 25 years. She is a passionate risk and compliance professional who believes, combined with good governance, risk and compliance can help the business with planning and growth whilst mitigating and managing risk.

Vicky is a fellow of the International Compliance Association with which she holds 2 Diplomas; in addition, she holds a BA (Hons) in Politics and a MA in Politics.

Away from work she enjoys following F1 and creative hobbies.

Jonathan Bird

Client Services Manager

Email: jonathan.bird@imperiumfs.com

Telephone: +44 1534 837600

Jonathan joined Imperium Trust Company (Jersey) Limited in 2024 as a Manager within the Private Client department.

Jonathan has held positions with local trust company businesses for over 15 years and has experience of managing complex multi-jurisdictional trust and company Private Client structures, established for the efficient investment and planning of family and private client wealth. This includes a range of asset classes from managed and advisory investment portfolios to real estate, artwork, antiques and antiquities.

Jonathan is an Associate of The Chartered Governance Institute and was recently awarded the JD Clarke Award for Best Paper in his Company Law exam. Jonathan is a Chartered Company Secretary and Governance Professional and also holds a Level 2 Award with the Chartered Management Institute.

In his spare time, Jonathan enjoys spending time with his family, cooking a range of different cuisines and the odd round of golf.

Lauren Read

Manager

Email: lauren.read@imperiumfs.com

Telephone: +44 1481 728380

Lauren joined Imperium Fund Services Limited in January 2024 as a Manager.

She has over 11 years of financial services experience working in the private equity sector and is a fellow of the Association of Chartered Certified Accountants.

Prior to joining Imperium, Lauren began her career at Aztec Group in accounting and progressed within the company to the role of Financial Reporting Manager. In addition to her experience with team and client management, Lauren has gained extensive experience over the years in financial reporting, administration and the company secretarial aspects of a varied portfolio of regulated and non-regulated fund structures.

Michael Whitehead

Client Services Manager

Email: michael.whitehead@imperiumfs.com

Telephone: +44 1534 837600

Michael joined Imperium Trust Company (Jersey) Limited in January 2024 as Client Services Manager.

Michael has held positions with large local financial service businesses for over 10 years and has experience of a variety of private client structures holding quoted and unquoted investments, commercial and residential property, property development and luxury assets. In addition, Michael has experience in servicing multi-jurisdictional institutional clients with an emphasis on commercial property holding structures with global operations. Michael is member of the Association of Chartered Certified Accountants (ACCA) and in 2021 was named in the ‘eprivateclient top 35 under 35’, being recognised as a leading young private client practitioner in the UK and UK Crown Dependencies.

In his spare time Michael enjoys travelling and keeping fit by attending the gym.

Nicky Sangan

Compliance Manager

Email: nicky.sangan@imperiumfs.com

Telephone: +44 1481 728380

Nicky joined Imperium Fund Services Limited in September 2023 as Compliance Manager leading the financial crime, regulatory and client compliance function. Nicky has worked in compliance for over 10 years, has experience in the legal, fiduciary, banking and investment sectors and holds the ICA Diploma in Compliance.

Prior to joining Imperium, Nicky held the prescribed position of Compliance Officer for Sanne Group (Guernsey) Limited, Sanne Fund Services (Guernsey) Limited and FundRock Capital Management (Company) Limited, where she was a member of the management team and was also the representative Compliance Officer for Administered Licensees.

Her compliance career started at Appleby law firm where she working alongside the partners to establish the Guernsey office, giving her both compliance and operational experience, following which she also spent time at New Street Management Limited, LTS Tax Limited, and Butterfield.

Pam van Huyssteen

Human Resources Manager

Email: Pam.VanHuyssteen@imperiumfs.com

Telephone: +44 1481 728380

Pam joined Imperium in May 2014 and is one of our longest serving employee’s.

A people person, Pam is a Mental Health First Aider as well as a Certified Coach. She has completed her CIPD Diploma in Human Resources Practice and is also an Associate Member of the Chartered Management Institution.

Pam has grown alongside the Company and manages a varied role combining various aspects of Office Management together with Human Resources.

Born in South Africa, she enjoys exploring the Guernsey beaches with her active young son and loves the water.

Pauline Dron

Trust Manager

Email: pauline.dron@imperiumfs.com

Telephone: +44 1689 898222

Pauline joined Imperium UK in March 2024 as a Trust Manager initially providing administrative trust support to the UK Directors and to build a portfolio of her own trust and company clients.

Pauline is originally from Jersey and has over 20 years of experience in the offshore Fiduciary sector and recently moved to the UK in November of 2022. Prior to joining Imperium, Pauline spent 9 years working for a medium sized independent Jersey based fiduciary company where she was responsible for the day-to-day management and administration of a Private Office structure involving company administration, property and vehicle management and an element of employee management.

Pauline holds a BA Hons in Education and Community Studies, Certificate in Offshore Administration and STEP Diploma in International Trust Management.

Having completed four London Marathon’s, Pauline’s running days are now behind her and in her spare time she enjoys travelling, socialising with friends and spending time with her two nephews.

Kim Treamer

UK Financial Controller

Email: kim.treamer@imperiumfs.com

Telephone: +44 1689 898222

Kim joined Imperium UK in June 2024 as UK Financial Controller.

Kim is a fellow of the Association of Chartered Certified Accountants having qualified in 2018 and brings with her 8 years of experience working in practice and 6 years of experience in industry.

Prior to joining Imperium, Kim has worked as a financial controller and an as an accounts manager where over the years has gained a wealth of experience in management accounting, internal reporting and financial accounting.

Kim has experience managing the internal finance function in both the trading and financial sectors, and additionally has experience managing a portfolio of corporate clients in a trust and corporate services business, with a main focus on their accounting and tax requirements.

Outside of work Kim loves spending time with her husband, daughter and two Jack Russells, gardening and exploring new cities.

Sarah Edwards

Manager

Email: sarah.edwards@imperiumfs.com

Telephone: +44 20 3026 5667

Sarah graduated from University in 2014 with a first-class degree in Accounting and Finance. She then began her career working for a local company helping to prepare management accounts whilst studying to become a Chartered Accountant. In 2016 she decided to specialise in tax and joined Page Tax Consulting.

Sarah is now ACCA qualified and has moved on to her Chartered Tax Advisor exams to broaden her tax knowledge further.

Outside of work, Sarah enjoys martial arts and has a Black belt in Karate and Kickboxing, when she’s not revising for her next exam. She also loves to travel all over the world at every opportunity she gets.

Expertise

Tax

Vicki Stewart

Administration Manager

Email: victoria.stewart@imperiumfs.com

Telephone: +44 20 3026 5667

Vicki is the one that keeps the office running smoothly. Vicki’s background is hospitality so she is used to working under pressure, organising people and most importantly doing so with a smile!

Vicki supports the entire team, up to Director level, with office management and is also our guru when it comes to marketing.

When Vicki is not in the office, she will be busy looking after her two young boys. She is also a massive foodie, so loves cooking, baking and dining out at local eateries.

Toni Twine

Operations Manager

Email: toni.twine@imperiumtrustuk.com

Telephone: +44 1689 898222

Toni started her employment at Imperium UK in May 2022 to provide support to the UK directors and assist in an operations role. She was initially employed as a consultant between September - November 2021 to find new premises in Kent and handle the logistics of the move.

Toni first gained experience as an operations manager when working in London for Verfides (formerly Fortis InterTrust (UK) Ltd), The Economist Group and the FCA (Financial Conduct Authority).
